name: Demigod (itch)
description:
Move with WASD, Space for jump, use Mouse to aim.

Charge your weapon with Left Mouse Button and release to shoot. The longer you charge more powerful it becomes.

Collect Favor drops to gain god's favor and boost your combat capabilities. Collect Favor drop at the end fof the wave to start next wave.

Earn your place ABOVE amongst GODS with blood of monsters from BELOW.
